dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:

ATTN: Google, Inc.
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Fax: [private]

FROM: [private]
Travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private]
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
E-mail: [private]@gmail.com

SUBJ: Copyright infringement
DATE: Sep. 26, 2007

Dear Google, Inc.

1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.

The offender is www.chinatravelkey.com. They copied 20 pages of contents and 1 image from our website. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages and image.

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website:

(1)Search Query "wumen chinatravelkey"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/forbidden/meridan_gate.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/forbiddencity/buildings/wumen.htm (The third paragraph is copied from our 2nd paragraph.)

(2)Search Query "forbidden city architecture chinatravelkey"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/cityguides/beijing/forbidden.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/forbiddencity/architecture.htm (The last paragraph copied our content from "Ancient Chinese people" in the second paragraph to the end of the third paragraph.)

(3)Search Query "forbidden city chinatravelkey"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/cityguides/beijing/forbidden.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/forbiddencity.htm (Their second paragraphs copied out content from "Until 1924" in the first paragraph to the end of the first paragraph.)

(4)Search Query "ancient observatory history chinatravelkey"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20030404095058/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/observa.htm (April 2003 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/ancientobservatory/history.htm (Their first paragraph copied our first paragraph; their fifth paragraph copied our content in the second paragraph from "In the Qing Dynasty" to "as a museum".)

(5)Search Query "recumbent buddha temple chinatravelkey"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/wofo.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/templeofrecumbentbuddha.htm (Their first paragraph copied our first paragraph; their last paragraph copied our fourth paragraph.)

(6)Search Query "chinatravelkey jingshan park history"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/jingshan.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/jingshanpark/history.htm (Their fist paragraph copied our third paragraph; their last three paragraphs copied our sixth to eighth paragraphs.)

(7)Search Query "chinatravelkey great bell temple"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20030626001058/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/bell_temple.htm (June 2003 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/greatbelltemple.htm (The last three paragraphs are copied from our last three paragraphs.)

(8)Search Query "chinatravelkey chinese cloisonne"
our Copyrighted page: http://web.archive.org/web/20060205025537/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/intro/arts/cloisonne.htm (February 2006 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/china_products/chinese_cloisonne.htm (The 2nd ad 3rd paragraphs copied from our 1st and 2nd paragraphs.)

(9)Search Query "chinatravelkey visit season"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020808073742/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/when-to-come.htm (August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/traveltips/visitseason.htm

(10)Search Query "chinatravelkey tips travel insurance" (see "more results from www.chinatravelkey.com")
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020802165334/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/insurance.htm (August 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/traveltips/travelinsurance.htm (Their second paragraph entirely copied our second paragraph.)

(11) Search Query "chinatravelkey tips travel exit regulation"
our Copyrighted page: http://web.archive.org/web/20020713134615/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/exit.htm
(July 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/traveltips/exitregulation.htm

(12)Search Query "chinatravelkey daxingshan temple"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/shaanxi/xian/daxingshan.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/xian/attractions/daxingshantemple/daxingshantemple.htm (Their content copied from our 1st, 2nd and 4th paragraphs.)

(13)Search Query "chinatravelkey baoguang temple"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/sichuan/chengdu/baoguang.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/chengdu/chengduattractions/baoguangtemple.htm (The last two paragraphs copied from ours.)

(14)Search Query "chinatravelkey nanyue kings tomb"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/guangdong/guangzhou/nanyue_king.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/guangzhou/guangzhouattractions/westernhannanyueking%27stombmuseum.htm (The second paragraph copied our 2nd paragraph.)

(15)Search Query "hangzhou attractions west lake chinatravelkey" (see "more results from this site")
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/zhejiang/hangzhou/west_lake.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/hangzhou/attractions/westlake.htm (The 3rd paragraph is from our 4th paragraph.)

(16) Search Query "whitedagobatemple chinatravelkey"
Our copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20030819030726/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/white_pagoda.htm (August 2003 version)
Infringing page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/whitedagobatemple/architecture.htm (The 3rd paragraph copied our fourth and fifth paragraphs.)

(17) Search Query "ancientobservatory chinatravelkey"
Our copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20030404095058/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/observa.htm (April 2003 version)
Infringing page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/ancientobservatory/architecture.htm (The first two paragraphs are copied from our 3rd and 4th paragraphs)

(18) Search Query "templeofrecumbentbuddha chinatravelkey"
Our copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/wofo.htm
Infringing page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/templeofrecumbentbuddha/architecture.htm

(19) Search Query "jingshanpark chinatravelkey"
Our copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/jingshan.htm
Infringing page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/jingshanpark/layout.htm
(The 1st and 2nd paragraphs are copied from our 2nd and 3rd paragraphs)

(20) Search Query "bellanddrumtower chinatravelkey"
Our copyrighted page: http://web.archive.org/web/20030403222901/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/bell.htm (April 2003 version)
Infringing page:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/beijing/attractions/bellanddrumtower/function.htm (The last three paragraphs are copied from our 5th, 6th and 7th paragraphs.)

3. Hereunder is the detailed information on the images they have copied from our website:

(1) Our Copyrighted Image: http://www.travelchinaguide.com/images/photogallery/0024000/datong%20wooden%20pagoda%2010023642tm.jpg
Infringing Image:
http://www.chinatravelkey.com/pic/singlecitytour/datong/WoodenPagoda-1.jpg
Infringing Image on Google: http://images.google.com/images?gbv=2&svnum=10&hl=en&newwindow=1&q=chinatravelkey+wooden+pagoda

4. My contact information:
[private]
[private]@gmail.com
www.travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private]

5. The contact info of the copyright offender www.chinatravelkey.com is:
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
Email: [private]@chinatravelkey.com

6. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

7. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,

[private]

Ps.: According to your instruction, all our copyright complaint can be sent to you only via email. Please refer to our faxed document to you on July 6th, 2007.
